general_info.summary: This document appears to be a list of various programs, schools, reports, initiatives, and resources offered or maintained by Sharda University. It covers academic offerings like the 2025-26 Programme, different schools (Dental, Medical Sciences, Nursing), examination reports, academic credits, feedback mechanisms, and university materials. It also highlights student support services, skill enhancement programs, communication initiatives, entrepreneurship, media presence (FM Radio), and international collaborations, along with administrative and legal aspects of the university.

career_info.summary: This text outlines the application process and career paths available after completing a course, specifically mentioning a biotechnology instructor role and highlighting a salary range of 4.50 LPA to 12.00 LPA, with recruiters being involved. It encourages individuals to pursue a career in engineering.
career_info.raw_content:
How to apply for the course?
Career path you can choose after the course
• Biotechnology Instructor
Students of this programme are placed in companies with an average annual package of 4.50 LPA to 12.00 LPA
Take the next step towards a career in engineering.
• Recruiters
